name: Skullkeeper
description:
Skullkeeper is a game where you play the little skeleton known as Cayde.
Cayde is the 6th summoned undead to defeat the army of undeads and bring peace back.

     KEYBOARD                 CONTROLS                     GAMEPAD

                   A/D                      = Movement =              Left- / Right Button

               S               =  Fall through platforms =        Down Button

    Space                         = Jump =                               A / X
